id: scenario-value-scanner-teen-scenarios-ecological-bioregional-local and seasonal food choices recognized as bioregional care
title: Local and seasonal food choices recognized as bioregional care
description: Local and seasonal food choices recognized as bioregional care
content:
Scenario: Local and seasonal food choices recognized as bioregional care
    Given Jasmine is shopping for fresh produce
    And she has option between local strawberries and imported berries
    When bioregional_elohim provides decision support
    Then it should highlight local, seasonal options
    And explain bioregional benefits: "Local strawberries support regional farmers and reduce transport emissions"
    And help her understand food system connections to ecosystem health
    And recognize her choice of local food as care for bioregion
    And track bioregional care contributions alongside other care work
    And demonstrate that environmental stewardship is care economy participation
